item.title: Implementing a Unix Shell
item.description: My senior research project was implementing a Unix shell in the Rust language. Here’s a few things I discovered along the way.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I’m Shreyas. Some things you should probably know about me: I’m a senior at Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology. I’m a co-captain of TJHSST Science Olympiad. Science Olympiad is a national science competition. I’ve participated in Science Olympiad since eighth grade and gone to nationals with TJ twice. I’m also a founder and lead maintainer of Duosmium Results, a popular Science Olympiad results archive and publisher.
